mapper.select:
select
from t_order where status != ${@com.iflytransporter.common.enums.Status@Order_Publish} and auth_status = ${@com.iflytransporter.common.enums.Status@Order_Auth_Yes}
and departure_province_id = #{departureProvinceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
and departure_city_id = #{departureCityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
and departure_area_id = #{departureAreaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
and destination_province_id = #{destinationProvinceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
and destination_city_id = #{destinationCityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
and destination_area_id = #{destinationAreaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
and car_type_id = #{carTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
and tyre_no = #{tyreNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
and car_length = #{carLength,jdbcType=INTEGER},
and goods_type = #{goodsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update: update t_order set data_status = ${@com.iflytransporter.common.enums.Status@Status_Invalid},update_date = now() where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_order
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_date = now(),
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select b.id applyId,b.order_id as orderId,b.costs,b.transporter_id as transporterId,c.surname,c.`name`,c.mobile,c.create_date as registerDate,d.id companyId,d.`name` companyName, ifnull(round(e.grade),5) as grade,ifnull(f.count,0) as count from t_order a left join t_order_apply b on a.id = b.order_id left JOIN t_user c on b.transporter_id = c.id left join t_company d on c.company_id = d.id left join (select transporter_id,AVG(IFNULL(serve_grade,0)+IFNULL(loading_grade,0)+IFNULL(goods_grade,0))/3 as grade from t_comment GROUP BY transporter_id) e on b.transporter_id = e.transporter_id left join (select transporter_id ,count(1) as count from t_waybill GROUP BY transporter_id) f on b.transporter_id = f.transporter_id where a.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and b.status = #{applyStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select a.id,a.surname,a.`name`,a.create_date as registerDate,ifnull(round(b.grade),5) as grade,ifnull(c.count,0) as count from t_user a left join (select shipper_id,AVG(IFNULL(serve_grade,0)+IFNULL(loading_grade,0)+IFNULL(goods_grade,0))/3 as grade from t_transporter_comment GROUP BY shipper_id) b on a.id = b.shipper_id left join (select shipper_id ,count(1) as count from t_waybill GROUP BY shipper_id) c on a.id = c.shipper_id where a.id = #{shipperId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ifnull(round(b.serveGrade),5) as serveGrade,ifnull(round(b.loadingGrade),5) as loadingGrade, ifnull(round(b.goodsGrade),5) as goodsGrade,ifnull(b.commentCount,0) as commentCount from t_user a left join (select shipper_id,count(1) as commentCount , AVG(IFNULL(serve_grade,0))as serveGrade,AVG(IFNULL(loading_grade,0))as loadingGrade,AVG(IFNULL(goods_grade,0)) as goodsGrade from t_transporter_comment GROUP BY shipper_id) b on a.id = b.shipper_id where a.id = #{shipperId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
